Solar Installation

This setup is for companies providing solar equipment and its installation service. Usually residential customer places order from 1 kW to 10 kW while others up to 100 kW. Solar panels and other equipment are installed at customer site based on kW capacity.

Work Flows

Flow 1: Website Form -> CRM -> Sales -> Accounting -> Field Service 

Open Website Contact Us Form

Potential customer fills up the Contact us form and Submit it, in CRM opportunity is created.

CRM Stages

Sales Person is assigned and Opportunity is moved to Qualified stage. Sales Person follows up with customer through Activities like Call, Meeting, etc. If customer agrees, site survey is planned and Opportunity is moved to Site Survey stage. At the time of Sales Order confirmation, Opportunity will be moved to Won stage (Automated Action).

Quotation for Installation

Final Quotation for installation is confirmed and sent to customer and 100%Advance payment is received. 

Field Service Task for Installation

Confirmation of Sales Order creates 1 Field Service Task automatically for Solar system installation in a Project dedicated to Installation.

Task Assignment & Planning for Installation and Delivery of Equipments

Task is assigned to Employees/Workers. Site visit is planned and Task is moved to Planned stage in Project.  Assignees takes all the equipments listed in Delivery Order along with them while visiting Client's site for Installation.

Worksheet for Installation

Assignees fills up the Worksheet after completion of the Installation. Several images of Solar System installation of Client's site is captured along with customer's confirmation and signature in Worksheet. Worksheet includes customised fields like Start date, End date, plan, signature, etc which is configured through Studio App.

Flow 2: Manual Opportunity -> CRM -> Sales -> Accounting -> Field Service 

Opportunity is created manually in CRM. From CRM, the flow is same as above

Flow 3: Helpdesk -> Repair 

Helpdesk Ticket

- Customer can raise a ticket to Customer Care team for Repair through mail, "Submit a Ticket" form or clicking on Chat bot button in Help page in Website. Support Ticket will be generated in Helpdesk app. 

- Helpdesk User will create Repair in draft mode and fills up Customer's details in it like equipment to be repaired, warranty end date, etc.

- Warranty end date is fetched from delivery of the equipment. (Automated Action)

 Repair

- Inventory user will validate returned equipment in Return and check the warranty end date. If warranty date is not under the warranty period, invoice will be raised for parts replaced and repairing charge.  

- Assigned user will confirm the Repair, start the repair, finish the repairing work and inform the Helpdesk user for the same through Chatter functionality. 

- Helpdesk user will confirm with the customer whether they will pick up the equipment from repairing site or request to deliver the equipment to their address. 

- In case of pick up, ticket will be closed after customer's confirmation of checking equipment at repairing site. 

- In case of delivery to customer's address, Helpdesk user will communicate with the customer after delivery and take confirmation from customer about equipment working and closes the Ticket.
